subject: Re: [junit] Problem in running Sample tests
msgSnippet: ... You are using a different version of java to the one used to compile the classes you are attempting to run. This version of JUnit requires java 1.5. --
messageBody:
pradeep_3diitr wrote:
> When I am trying to run Sample Test Cases (JUnit standard package) I
> get following error -
>
> D:\Pradeep\Downloads\JUnitDownloaded2\junit4.1>java
> junit.samples.AllTests
> Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError:
> junit/samples
> /AllTests (Unsupported major.minor version 49.0)
You are using a different version of java to the one used to compile the
classes you are attempting to run.

This version of JUnit requires java 1.5.

--
Mark
